# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| `2.0.x`   | `yes` |
| `1.6.x`   | `yes` |
| `1.5.x`   | `yes` |
| `<1.5.x` | `no` |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

To report a security vulnerability, please [`Open a draft security advisory`](https://github.com/mockery/mockery/security/advisories/new) so we can coordinate the fix and disclosure.
